[Skip to main content](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868074410012-How-do-I-change-the-currency-displayed-for-my-inventory#main-content) * * * Learn how to change the currency displayed for your offerings by changing the [base currency](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868074410012-How-do-I-change-the-currency-displayed-for-my-inventory#h_01HRN57F70DWTR5NH3WMKVV8VW) of your account or using our [Currency Display integration](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868074410012-How-do-I-change-the-currency-displayed-for-my-inventory#h_01HRN57F70CGB6VB3A5B9V03TQ) to offer Customers the option to choose which currency displays on your Customer Booking Page. * * * ## **Accessing the features mentioned in this article** **Where can I find this feature using the top menu?** - **Base Currency**: Manage > Setup > Locale - **Currency Display**: Manage > Integrations > Sales > Currency Display **What more do I need to use this feature?** - [Admin](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868502205212) permissions to Manage your account and Integrations. **Which Checkfront version supports this feature - classic items, classic products, or both?** - This feature is available in both our classic version using classic items (Inventory > Items) and our classic version using classic products (Inventory > Products).  → [Learn more about products](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868100241052) * * * ## Currency display overview [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868074410012-How-do-I-change-the-currency-displayed-for-my-inventory# "Back to top") Do you want to change the currency displayed in your account or on your Customer Booking Page? Currency display for inventory can be customized in two ways: by [changing the base currency within your account](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868074410012-How-do-I-change-the-currency-displayed-for-my-inventory#h_01HRN57F70DWTR5NH3WMKVV8VW) or by giving your Customers the option to [choose which currency displays](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868074410012-How-do-I-change-the-currency-displayed-for-my-inventory#h_01HRN57F70CGB6VB3A5B9V03TQ) on your Customer Booking Page. Read the following steps to change how currency is displayed. * * * ## Changing the account base currency [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868074410012-How-do-I-change-the-currency-displayed-for-my-inventory# "Back to top") ![Base Currency](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868074347676) The main currency used within your account can be changed by following these steps: 1. Navigate to the **Locale** area (Manage > Setup > Locale). 2. Open the **Base Currency** dropdown menu and select the currency you want your account to show, e.g. _Canadian Dollars_. 3. Click **Save** to save your changes. | | | | --- | --- | | ![Learn more](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868073712924) | Learn more about how to change your account's base currency here:
- [Setting up your account locale](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868217054876) | * * * ## Changing the booking page currency display [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868074410012-How-do-I-change-the-currency-displayed-for-my-inventory# "Back to top") ![Currency Tile](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868062451740) Your Customer Booking Page can show a dropdown menu where Customers choose the currency they prefer the inventory to display. Follow these steps: 1. Navigate to the **Integrations** area (Manage > Integrations > Sales). 2. Click the Currency Display tile to set up and activate the integration. 3. Once activated, a currency menu shows on your Customer Booking Page. | | | | --- | --- | | ![Learn more](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868073712924) | Learn more about how to configure the Currency Display integration here:
- [Introduction to currency display](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868129197468) |
